title: Cardano-based Marketplace: Round 2
description: A user can easily create a token but does not have any way to sell their token besides peer-to-peer trading.
solution: The marketplace will allow any user to sell any token on the Cardano blockchain using smart contracts written in Plutus and Marlowe.
experience:
